name: Overview

[{"id":"b8b74e5d-69a5-4df1-98bc-5d8c293ec4af","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"da02b583-7231-4630-98d1-cfe14842f64a","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"da5dc490-6fd1-410a-8a21-cb98d436dcd1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function constructs and configures a new instance of
","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallGraphGenerator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It captures all user‑provided analysis options and
immediately prepares the internal environment required to perform static
analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a6cf2573-bd8a-429e-951d-e5fd36eb2642","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This function answers the question:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"03ad0af3-d0bf-480f-8c7d-e92971f763f5","type":"quote","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“How is a call graph analysis session configured and initialized?”","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a5a81ddf-6247-4133-9d89-0c6602637f77","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"f68bf8cd-5536-426f-8372-4ddfb1804695","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role Within the System","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5df6fe67-cdb8-4dd6-930c-61d3c371bbbd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This function belongs to the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Initialization and Environment Setup","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" layer and
serves as the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"entry point for configuration","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It defines the parameters that
shape the entire analysis lifecycle and ensures the system is ready for
execution immediately after instantiation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"85b36733-9b9a-4181-9410-b07ac373b9e9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"All analysis runs begin with this constructor.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b6ef4afd-a5fb-48a6-9302-f745e8b397f2","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"feb42a3f-5946-429a-8163-3e33ff1c574c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Conceptual Responsibilities","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d685d293-cfef-4321-b157-59e742652738","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"At a conceptual level, the constructor performs three key tasks:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dc637b54-97be-4c2d-bafa-a42aad0dbe67","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":5,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. Configuration Capture","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7ca8817f-342c-48d8-8874-b7fcdff582cf","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Records entry points that define where analysis begins","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cc49f9f4-e881-49d9-b6a0-799ebb88a812","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Stores the package root that bounds module resolution","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7a4b0746-6aa4-4632-ba18-3985697ccac5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Enables or disables dependency traversal","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ef9c6ce0-a6fb-4fe9-a55c-eca9f20f1356","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Applies optional precision (flow‑sensitive) analysis settings","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6f94224d-9128-444a-94e2-2ae6f91977d7","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Accepts optional explicit module entry definitions","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e9455c9c-958d-4470-b5bf-858b66a1091e","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":5,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. Initial State Setup","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"42268d65-f24c-4434-b93e-7f5c5f647326","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Initializes high‑level object state","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b1688fe3-6849-4150-8856-2ae0aed2caae","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Establishes placeholders for analysis‑time data","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1055bbed-e07b-4b3a-a1c2-31b061ad5780","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":5,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3. Environment Preparation","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a0a61bb4-e9a1-4117-ad8b-d0cfcf3dba83","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Delegates full subsystem initialization to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"setUp","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a2d0b0b9-bd07-4a0e-9e74-19de10a14bfe","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ensures the instance is immediately ready for analysis execution","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"337f469a-ff14-406f-89d6-cc6ca7edbeaa","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"a966c895-2a92-4e67-975b-7aa39d247c84","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why This Function Is Important","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"92142ca0-85a6-4836-8a07-604d4ad693fc","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis behavior depends heavily on initial configuration. Entry points,
package boundaries, and traversal modes directly affect:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"42921dad-d621-4104-ba8f-4f52839a0b06","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Which code is analyzed","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"acfcee98-97bf-415c-9285-aee8dcec22ae","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How dependencies are resolved","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de06543b-f46c-469f-af46-3a6548cd8a09","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How precise the resulting call graph is","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"afe1fde8-7704-414b-9d93-7fc253b24214","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By capturing all configuration in one place and immediately invoking setup, this
constructor ensures that:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dbf7a5c8-1779-4c49-aca8-0b81921b0ecc","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"No analysis runs in a partially configured state","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3b019111-0b6b-4431-844f-61f768dbec5e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Configuration is immutable for the lifetime of the analysis session","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d262a30b-0118-4271-b003-68d6f0b3f4e2","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"b1d1b59c-510b-4a8b-b768-2a1f22a8e6a7","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Insight","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de4bb5cb-294f-4c92-a94f-dd24f190abc1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This constructor reflects a key Jarvis design principle:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8033812d-b8f6-423c-bcba-06be57eb242b","type":"quote","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Configuration should be explicit, complete, and applied early.","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4834afa7-4094-4930-b5f9-280341ecf1b7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By requiring all major options at construction time and immediately preparing
the environment, Jarvis avoids hidden defaults and late‑binding configuration
errors.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b140b690-707a-4190-99c2-8b14bdd3005b","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"88cee9e7-1fa3-42da-806c-60d0ea65a3a8","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Relationship to Other Components","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a5f249d0-08a1-4598-87bd-7c8877cdfede","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Invokes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"setUp","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to initialize all analysis subsystems","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6c83d725-91aa-4c37-bb15-7aa15f40bdf5","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Precedes any execution‑related methods such as ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"analyze","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3f0869b0-8b05-4689-ad40-65dc2f1bcb3c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Defines the configuration context used by all managers and processors","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0a68938b-cc2a-4644-8b71-d56d185089d9","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"2e15ca53-badf-48a4-8752-65180574d648","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Summary","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dabd7653-9a01-4ad9-8c45-9a23796089cd","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"__init__","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function establishes the configuration and readiness of the
","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CallGraphGenerator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". It ensures that every analysis session starts with a
well‑defined setup, making subsequent execution predictable, reproducible, and
correct.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"750a535b-710d-4792-a6dc-bded82046615","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
